body.content:
Hello Friend,

My name is David, I was diagnosed with Cancer five years ago and also
had a Spinal Cord Injury last two years. The Doctors are really doing
their best to make sure that I am back to life.

Now my business has crumbled and my extended family members are taking
advantage of my illness and Non of them bothered to care about me and
my business. I have vow never to do anything with them because of
their selfish interest.

My Plead is that you help me MOVE my Business/capital fund of $64.5M
USD in a finance firm to your account so that we can invest it in your
country. Though my business was actually Oil and Gas, I also engage
little in agriculture and real Estate, but if you have a better idea
on a good and lucrative business that one can invest on in your
country, you can equally introduce that to me, If you have an idea to
run this business in your Country probably we can initiate a better
ideas.

I will set aside 15% of the total for you for your time and efforts as
we go into this venture. I also have map out 5% of the total money
which will be for the little upfront expenses that you may cover
during the transferring of the fund into your Bank account
legitimately.

So in this regards, I will like you to honestly confirm your
capability of handling this transaction knowing fully well that you
will benefit from it and by the grace of God you will also handle all
the investments that the fund will be used for.

Do not forget that the 15% of the total fund will be for your good
care and kindness and also effort to make sure that the transaction is
done perfectly and legitimately.

I need your urgent reply on this so that I will not have to go on
sourcing for another credible person to handle this project. If you
are okay with the condition, Please do not hesitate to send me mail so
that I can furnish you up with all the information needed.

Once I received your positive response, I will send the Prove of Fund
to you for your verification..

I wish to hear from you soon.

God bless you
David Edward Snow
